title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   We are ready to celebrate turning 100!               Got time on your  hands? Volunteer!               Work With Us!         Â      NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016 so we invite you to participate in the Find Your Park experiences to learn, discover and be inspired by the parks of the National Park Service.   Partners Everyone can make a difference.   Donate Regardless of what form your donation takes, it is greatly appreciated.   Volunteer Volunteers help to maintain our cultural and historic resources for today's visitor as well as for future generations who will visit, explore and learn at the park many years from now.   Work With Us The National Park Service has the responsibility to protect and preserve our national treasures and to provide a wide range of services to our many visitors.
